info.name: Remote Potato - Clean
info.description: Cleaned up CSS for the Web Interface of Remote Potato (www.remotepotato.com)
info.additionalInfo:
This theme is for the Remote Potato Web Interface which runs on your Media Center PC, see http://www.remotepotato.com/ for more infomation

- Change 192.168.0.2 to localhost if it doesn't work for you.
